title: BRIEF-Supreme Cannabis' Wellness Brand, Blissco, Receives Cannabis Oil Sales License

BRIEF-Supreme Cannabis' Wellness Brand, Blissco, Receives Cannabis Oil Sales License

Stock Markets 15 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Supreme Cannabis' Wellness Brand, Blissco, Receives Cannabis Oil Sales License Oct 8 (Reuters) - Supreme Cannabis Company Inc : * SUPREME CANNABIS' WELLNESS BRAND, BLISSCO, RECEIVES CANNABIS OIL SALES LICENSE * SUPREME CANNABIS COMPANY INC - BLISSCO EXPECTS TO SHIP FIRST CBD OIL PRODUCT TO CANADIAN MARKET IN Q2 FISCAL 2020
